t: French Connection Group Ltd Company Profile - Overview - GlobalData
s: French Connection Group Ltd (FCG) a subsidiary of Mip Holdings Ltd, carries out the design, production, and distribution of branded clothing for men and women. The company provides fragrances, shoes, swimwear, fragrances, watches, hats and scarves, jewellery, men wear, women wear and eyewear.
